}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''[[rtl8192cu]]''' source states this device is an '''[[Abocom]]''' device. It's assumed to be a [[AboCom WU5508]].
[http://obdnmagazine.blogspot.com/2012/10/tested-planex-gw-useco300-lan-ax3a6.html <nowiki>[.tested] Planex GW-USEco300 無線LANアダプタ [AX3][A6] (JP)</nowiki>] :00:22:CF OUI ('''[[Planex]]''')
